localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

blogPost.excerpt: Hugo improves meeting productivity for teams. It connects to your work calendar providing one place to collaboratively prepare, take notes, assign tasks and share insights. ⠀ Get on top of remote meetings with notes that connect to your team and their tools.
blogPost.body: Hugo improves meeting productivity for teams. It connects to your work calendar providing one place to collaboratively prepare, take notes, assign tasks and share insights. ⠀ Get on top of remote meetings with notes that connect to your team and their tools.
blogPost.title: Hugo - Better meetings through centralized, actionable notes
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 雨果提高了团队的会议效率。它与您的工作日历相连接，提供一个协作准备、记录、分配任务和分享见解的地方。⠀ 通过连接到您的团队和他们的工具的笔记，掌握远程会议的情况。
localize.tagline: 通过集中的、可操作的说明改进会议

localize.description: 雨果提高了團隊的會議效率。它與您的工作日曆相連接，提供一個協作準備、記錄、分配任務和分享見解的地方。⠀ 通過連接到您的團隊和他們的工具的筆記，掌握遠程會議的情況。
localize.tagline: 通過集中的、可操作的說明改進會議

previous.excerpt: Paid Rooms lets you host paywalled private clubhouse rooms. Set one up in less than 30 seconds, simply: 1) Sign up with your phone number 2) Enter your room details 3) Share it an get paid 💰
previous.title: Paid Clubhouse Rooms - Charge $$$ for Clubhouse rooms

localize.description: 付费房可以让您托管付费墙式私人会所房间。在不到30秒的时间里就可以设置一个，简单地说：1）用你的电话号码注册 2）输入你的房间细节 3）分享它并获得报酬 💰
付費房可以讓您託管付費牆式私人會所房間。在不到30秒的時間裏就可以設置一個，簡單地說：1）用你的電話號碼註冊 2）輸入你的房間細節 3）分享它並獲得報酬 💰

next.excerpt: They are perfect to be used in email to redirect iOS users to the app store, android users to the play store and for those that uses a computer, you can redirect them to your web app. And those users we can not match, they will be sent do your default url.
next.title: Kameleont - Create dynamic links that redirects based on device or OS

localize.description: 他们是完美的被用于在电子邮件中重定向iOS用户到应用商店，安卓用户到Play商店和那些使用电脑，你可以重定向他们到你的Web应用程序。而那些我们无法匹配的用户，他们将被发送到做你的默认网址。
localize.tagline: 创建动态链接，根据设备或操作系统重定向。

localize.description: 他們是完美的被用於在電子郵件中重定向iOS用戶到應用商店，安卓用戶到Play商店和那些使用電腦，你可以重定向他們到你的Web應用程序。而那些我們無法匹配的用戶，他們將被髮送到做你的默認網址。
localize.tagline: 創建動態鏈接，根據設備或操作系統重定向。
